1.title: Recycling Your Ex
1.plot: Shallon throws a party where the girls all invite their exes and drama ensues when a couple of girls hook up with the same boy. Gurj and her out-of-town boyfriend try to figure out the rules around flirting with other people.

2.title: Becoming Ms. Right
2.plot: Having seen Shallon date one too many bad guys, her friends decide to set up an interview process to help find Shallon an eligible bachelor. Nikki enlists the girls' help to throw a sales party at her boutique.

3.title: Dating Outside the Box
3.plot: Victoria tries to broaden her dating scope by going out with women. Nikki reveals her marriage pact with best friend Ryan.

4.title: Working Girl
4.plot: Victoria anxiously awaits the results of her second attempt at the bar exam. The freedom that Klo felt by not having to work is starting to wear thin.

5.title: Tripping Out
5.plot: Shallon, Victoria and Nikki spend a girls' weekend at the Jersey Shore. Their fun is threatened when a guy from Shallon's past shows up. Gurj tries to have a romantic weekend with her boyfriend before he leaves to go on tour.

6.title: Growing Pains
6.plot: Shallon is excited to plan a bachelorette party for Klo, but wonders what toll marriage will take on their friendship. After an out-of-control shopping spree, Nikki debates a decision that could affect Victoria and Shallon.

imdb.plot outline: MTV steps inside the New York City social scene in Downtown Girls. The show chronicles the real-life exploits of Shallon Lester, a blogger for Glamour.com, and her friends, as they show they have what it takes to make it in the city together.
imdb.title: Downtown Girls
plot: MTV steps inside the New York City social scene in _Downtown Girls_ (qv). The show chronicles the real-life exploits of Shallon Lester, a blogger for Glamour.com, and her friends, as they show they have what it takes to make it in the city together.
